official_title: A resolution to elect Senator James O. Eastland, of the State of Mississippi, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.

summary.text: Elects the Honorable James O. Eastland, a Senator from the State of Mississippi, as the President of the Senate pro tempore, to hold office during the pleasure of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution to elect Senator James O. Eastland, of the State of Mississippi, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.
